byline.original: By HENRIK PRYSER LIBELL and PALKO KARASZ
byline.contributor: Henrik Pryser Libell reported from Oslo, and Palko Karasz from London. Stanley Reed contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The 13 people on board were en route from the Gullfaks B oil platform in the North Sea, and a land and sea search has recovered 11 bodies.

headline.main: Helicopter Crashes Off Norway, Leaving No Signs of Survivors

snippet: The 13 people on board were en route from the Gullfaks B oil platform in the North Sea, and a land and sea search has recovered 11 bodies.
